member.name: O:Codeunit::System#TestLibraries#Security#AccessControl#Permissions Mock
member.summary: "Permissions Mock" provides functions that let you simulate any permission set assignment for the current user.

member.name: M:Codeunit::System#TestLibraries#Security#AccessControl#Permissions Mock.ClearAssignments
member.summary: Clears all already assigned Permission Sets from the test user.

member.name: M:Codeunit::System#TestLibraries#Security#AccessControl#Permissions Mock.Assign(Code[20])
member.summary: Assigns the given permission set to the test user.

member.name: M:Codeunit::System#TestLibraries#Security#AccessControl#Permissions Mock.Set(Code[20])
member.summary: Clears all already assigned Permission Sets and Sets the given Permission Set along side with the All Objects Permission Set that provides execute access to all objects.

member.name: M:Codeunit::System#TestLibraries#Security#AccessControl#Permissions Mock.SetExactPermissionSet(Code[20])
member.summary: Clears all already assigned Permission Sets and Sets the given Permission Set No additional permissions are provided, even test execution permissions have to be handled manually.

member.name: M:Codeunit::System#TestLibraries#Security#AccessControl#Permissions Mock.IsStarted:Boolean
member.summary: Get whether permission sets mocking is started
member.returns: True if permission sets mocking is started.
